title: throw_spdlog_ex() not exported on windows (shared)
body:
Hello and thank you for this library !
Currently, the example produces a link error with the shared version on windows (vs2019):
```
1>example.obj : error LNK2019: unresolved external symbol "void __cdecl spdlog::throw_spdlog_ex(class std::basic_string<char,struct std::char_traits<char>,class std::allocator<char> > const &,int)" (?throw_spdlog_ex@spdlog@@YAXABV?$basic_string@DU?$char_traits@D@std@@V?$allocator@D@2@@std@@H@Z) referenced in function "private: void __thiscall spdlog::sinks::daily_file_sink<class std::mutex,struct spdlog::sinks::daily_filename_calculator>::delete_old_(void)" (?delete_old_@?$daily_file_sink@Vmutex@std@@Udaily_filename_calculator@sinks@spdlog@@@sinks@spdlog@@AAEXXZ)
1>example.obj : error LNK2019: unresolved external symbol "void __cdecl spdlog::throw_spdlog_ex(class std::basic_string<char,struct std::char_traits<char>,class std::allocator<char> >)" (?throw_spdlog_ex@spdlog@@YAXV?$basic_string@DU?$char_traits@D@std@@V?$allocator@D@2@@std@@@Z) referenced in function "public: __thiscall spdlog::sinks::daily_file_sink<class std::mutex,struct spdlog::sinks::daily_filename_calculator>::daily_file_sink<class std::mutex,struct spdlog::sinks::daily_filename_calculator>(class std::basic_string<char,struct std::char_traits<char>,class std::allocator<char> >,int,int,bool,unsigned short)" (??0?$daily_file_sink@Vmutex@std@@Udaily_filename_calculator@sinks@spdlog@@@sinks@spdlog@@QAE@V?$basic_string@DU?$char_traits@D@std@@V?$allocator@D@2@@std@@HH_NG@Z)
```
Just a missing `SPDLOG_API` in common.h (lines 207+208).
